## ğŸ¯ Job Dependencies

```
Lint â”€â”€â”
       â”œâ”€â”€> Build â”€â”€> Deploy (main only)
Test â”€â”€â”¤
       â”‚
E2E â”€â”€â”€â”˜
```

**Explanation:**

- Lint, Test, and E2E run in parallel (faster!)
- Build waits for Lint and Test to pass
- Deploy waits for Build and E2E to pass
- Deploy only runs on main branch

## ğŸ“‹ Detailed Job Breakdown

### 1ï¸âƒ£ Lint Job (2-3 minutes)

```
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚ Checkout code from GitHub       â”‚

â”‚ âœ“ Find potential bugs           â”‚
â”œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¤
```

- ESLint errors found
- TypeScript type errors

## â±ï¸ Total Time Estimates

### Pull Request (No Deploy)

```
Lint:  2-3 min  â”€â”
Test:  3-5 min  â”€â”¼â”€> Parallel
E2E:   5-10 min â”€â”˜
Build: 2-4 min

Total: ~10-15 minutes
```

### Main Branch Push (With Deploy)

```
Lint:   2-3 min  â”€â”
Test:   3-5 min  â”€â”¼â”€> Parallel
E2E:    5-10 min â”€â”˜
Build:  2-4 min
Deploy: 2-3 min

Total: ~15-20 minutes
```

## ğŸ¯ Success Criteria

Each job must pass for deployment to succeed:

```
Lint:   ESLint âœ“ + TypeScript âœ“
Test:   All tests âœ“ + Coverage â‰¥80% âœ“
E2E:    All Cypress tests âœ“
Build:  Production build âœ“
Deploy: GitHub Pages publish âœ“
```

## ğŸ”„ Rollback Strategy

If deployment fails or has issues:

```bash
# Option 1: Revert the commit
git revert HEAD
git push origin main

# Option 2: Force push previous commit
git reset --hard HEAD~1
git push --force origin main

# Option 3: Deploy specific commit
git checkout <good-commit-hash>
git push origin main
```

## ğŸ“ˆ Optimization Tips

### Speed Up CI/CD

1. **Use npm ci instead of npm install** âœ… (Already configured)
2. **Cache dependencies** âœ… (Already configured)
3. **Run jobs in parallel** âœ… (Already configured)
4. **Skip unnecessary steps** - Add conditions if needed

### Reduce Costs (GitHub Actions minutes)

1. **Skip CI on docs changes:**

   ```yaml
   on:
     push:
       paths-ignore:
         - "**.md"
   ```

2. **Use matrix strategy for multiple Node versions** (if needed)

3. **Cancel in-progress runs** âœ… (Already configured)
